titles.title: A resolution celebrating February 2, 2011, as the 25th anniversary of "National Women and Girls in Sports Day".
A resolution celebrating February 2, 2011, as the 25th anniversary of "National Women and Girls in Sports Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Celebrates February 2, 2011, as the 25th anniversary of National Women and Girls in Sports Day.
